name: Raheem JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS JUDGE, OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY PA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Johnson v. Court of Common Pleas Judge

parties: Raheem JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS JUDGE, OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY PA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of April, 2009, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and the Motion for Appointment of Counsel are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
969 A.2d 1178
Raheem JOHNSON, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS JUDGE, OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY PA, Respondent.
No. 10 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 2, 2009.
